articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Former U.S. President Donald Trump has embraced a popular digital fashion trend in his latest NFT collection. What's next?
articles.title: Trump Goes Phygital, Borrowing From Digital Fashion Playbook

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Size isn’t everything in artificial intelligence language models, as Redmond’s latest release stands up to challengers 25 times its size.
articles.title: Microsoft Packs Power Into Its New Small AI Model Phi-2

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The FIFA+ Collect platform will continue to launch NFTs on Algorand, but the soccer giant is also expanding to Polygon via drops on OpenSea.
articles.title: FIFA Will Mint Soccer NFTs on Polygon—But Isn't Ditching Algorand

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Fresh from a fundraising round at a $2 billion valuation, the French startup tout its LLM's strengths against established rival OpenAI.
articles.title: Mistral AI Picks ‘Mixture of Experts’ Model to Challenge GPT 3.5

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: After raising millions from crypto investors, the Immortal Game chess platform will no longer support its token or "play-to-earn" elements.
articles.title: Checkmate: Immortal Game Ditches Chess NFTs, Crypto Token Over 'Heavy Cheating'

articles.author: Guillermo Jimenez
articles.description: Decrypt is merging with Rug Radio with plans to change the way “crypto media” is done. You’ve got questions, we’ve got answers.
articles.title: What 'The Merge' Means for Decrypt, Rug Radio and You

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Sony has said it's investigating the breach after a hacking group reportedly stole data about employees and the upcoming Wolverine game.
articles.title: Hackers Demand $2 Million in Bitcoin After Stealing Insomniac Games Data: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Two words: Cyborg Trump. Former U.S. President Donald Trump goes back to the well on NFTs, and prices are falling yet again.
articles.title: Donald Trump Is Selling More NFTs—And the Original Sets Are Crashing Again

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The man who had the most infamous firing and re-hiring in corporate history shaped a juggernaut of a new global industry.
articles.title: Emerge 2023 Person of the Year: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: An SEC memo shares new details of a late November meeting the Commission held with BlackRock to discuss the asset manager's pending Bitcoin ETF application.
articles.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Shifts Risk to Crypto Market Makers, Not Banks

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Crypto exchange KuCoin will offer users $16.7 million in refunds, and will owe a further $5.3 million to the Office of the Attorney General.
articles.title: KuCoin Leaving New York After $22M NYAG Settlement—But Won't Call Ethereum a Security

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin may have retraced ground, but APT, ATOM, and other alts are on the rise today.
articles.title: Bitcoin Is Down—But These Altcoins Are Soaring

articles.description: Grammy-nominated electronic music duo Disclosure are releasing NFTs that each offer a different, AI-generated take on one of their songs.
articles.title: Electronic Music Duo Disclosure Drop AI-Powered NFTs on Beatport

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Avalanche has risen to become the 10th biggest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, overtaking meme coin Dogecoin.
articles.title: Avalanche Flips Dogecoin Market Cap With Double-Digit Surge

articles.description: Following its launch on Gala Games, OneUniverse’s turn-based mobile battler is pioneering next-gen NFT tech.
articles.title: Champions Arena is Ushering In a ‘New Generation’ of In-Game NFTs

articles.description: A 'Web2' action game previously released via Steam and console systems will be the first tradable digital PC title on Ultra.
articles.title: Ultra Reveals First Digital PC Game That Can Be Resold via NFT License

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: El Salvador's planned Bitcoin bonds have received approval from its Digital Assets Commission, paving the way for their issuance in 2024.
articles.title: El Salvador's Bitcoin 'Volcano Bonds' Receive Regulatory Approval for Q1 2024 Issuance

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: In the run-up to Chromia’s mainnet launch, players can now move their NFTs from BNB Chain and play new Season 4 content.
articles.title: 'My Neighbor Alice' Game Migrates From BNB Chain to Chromia With New Season

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Exclusive: Crypto startup Mirai Labs has moved to its own Avalanche subnet, heading to what it sees as green pastures for its horse-racing NFT game.
articles.title: 'Pegaxy' Game Studio Mirai Labs Leaves Polygon for Avalanche Subnet

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The new deal emphasizes worker inclusion in AI development and education and calls for public policy that supports worker needs.
articles.title: Microsoft and AFL-CIO Come to Terms on Unionization and AI

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Biotech enthusiasts are elated at the news, even though the discovery is only viable for research purposes today.
articles.title: ‘Brainoware’: Brain Cells Fused With AI Could Recognize Voices

articles.description: LA-based OurSky launches an ambitious program to democratize space exploration, making powerful telescopes accessible to hobbyists.
articles.title: OurSky Raises $9.5 Million to Add an API to Open-Source Astronomy

articles.description: GPTs are so helpful, they’ll often give away your instructions simply if they’re asked nicely.
articles.title: Your Custom GPT Could Be Tricked Into Giving Up Your Data

articles.description: Google Cloud will be the first “volunteer validator” on the XPLA gaming chain, adding to Google's growing list of crypto allies.

articles.description: The new tool lets users create diverse audio content using advanced AI, surpassing its controversial Voicebox predecessor.
articles.title: A Sound Decision: Meta Rolls Out AI-Powered Audiobox

articles.description:
This week our host Reza Jafery is joined by Joseph Schiarizzi, founder of OpenDollar and prolific solidity developer. 


We discuss: 
- Onchain beer
- Taking over your local government
- His Emmy and 3 patents?!?
articles.title: Creating peaceful money & taking over your local government w/ Joseph Schiarizzi

articles.description: The NFT game’s team is currently trying to appeal the ESRB rating to get back on Epic’s store.
articles.title: Gods Unchained Rated 'Adults Only' for Play-to-Earn Elements, Booted From Epic Games Store

articles.description: There has now been $516 million worth of liquidations on crypto futures contracts in the past day.

articles.description: Online advertising giant Google will soon permit the promotion of "cryptocurrency coin trusts" amid expected Bitcoin ETF approvals.

articles.description: He wasn’t always so bullish and his evolving relationship with crypto—what this could mean for the market—is why he is Person of the Year.

articles.description: Investors are largely interested in Bitcoin, but these two altcoins are grabbing attention.
articles.title: Investors Eyeing Up Solana and Avalanche as Cash Flows Into Funds

articles.description: Pixels has thousands of players and a PIXEL token is in the works—but the founder says they'll be "noisy as hell" about the launch.

articles.description: IMX is bucking the downward trend Monday following VanEck’s recent vote of confidence in crypto gaming platform Immutable.
articles.title: Immutable Climbs 10% While Most Gaming Tokens Fall With Bitcoin and Ethereum

articles.description: Bitcoin's upward march over the past month hit a bump in the road Monday morning, with the cryptocurrency's price slipping below $43,000.
articles.title: $330 Million in Crypto Longs Liquidated as Bitcoin Tumbles Below $43,000

articles.description: “This is an example of one plus one equalling three,” said Josh Quittner, who co-founded Decrypt in 2018.
articles.title: Decrypt Media Inc. and Rug Radio Merge to Create Global Web3 Publishing Company

articles.description: Crypto continued on the path of broad gains this week, creating a giddily optimistic online atmosphere.
articles.title: This Week On Crypto Twitter: Good for Meme Coins, Bad for (Alleged) Crypto Criminals

articles.description: The Pudgy Penguins NFT empire is expanding and will open the gates for its metaverse experience Pudgy World sometime in 2024.

articles.description: Bitcoin continued to rally this week. And major altcoins—especially meme coins—blew up in value as a result.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Rally Lends Meme Coins a Helping Hand

articles.description: Ember Sword CEO Mark Laursen shares why some big game studios "irk" him—and why he got into game development.
articles.title: INTERVIEW: Ember Sword CEO Says NFT Games Are More 'Transparent'

articles.description: At the 2023 Film3 Summit, Jordan Bayne—director and founder of The Squad—spoke with Decrypt's Sander Lutz about how the Film3 world has progressed over the last year and what decentralized technologies can offer to creators that want to buck the Hollywood system.
articles.title: Director Jordan Bayne on the State of Film3

articles.description:
Bright Moments co-founder Phil Mohun joins 5 Questions With SCENE to recount some favorite moments from the road, including negotiating with Patagonian gauchos, falling in love with Tokyo, and gaining a newfound appreciation for shrooms chocolate bars.

Shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Phil Mohun

articles.description: In this weeks episode we sit down with Cashtro from Arcade.xyz to discuss NFTs, shitcoins, what collections have held onto their floor prices, and more.
articles.title: Are NFTs Ever Coming Back?

articles.description: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung, EndeavorXR CEO Amy Peck and Gamee co-founder CEO Bozena Rezab joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves on stage at Web Summit to talk about the future of Web3 gaming.
articles.title: Web Summit: Will Web3 Gaming Ever be Mainstream?

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!

In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme. 

They discuss
- How to sell feet pics
- If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems
- the intersections between crypto and sex work
articles.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix

articles.description:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.

Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis

articles.description: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.
articles.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home

articles.description: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.
articles.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash

articles.description:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action. 


Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?
articles.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]

articles.description: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.
articles.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'

articles.description: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.
articles.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson

articles.description: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.
articles.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
